title: Ep70: Planning for the Somme
itunes:title: Ep70: Planning for the Somme
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary explore the planning and preparations that led to the gigantic Battle of the Somme in 1916. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or subscribe to our...
description:
Pete and Gary explore the planning and preparations that led to the gigantic Battle of the Somme in 1916.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Pete & Gary's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
